title: Eddie Highlights
content: Eddie kong Highlights is 15+ years of diverse experience across various IT domains including Cloud Services, Software Development & Support, and System Administration, alongside recent immersion in AI technologies, my focus is now squarely set on settling down in software development. 8+years in remote/virtual environments,collaborating effectively with diverse teams globally. Certifications: Azure AI Engineer Associate, MS Azure AZ-900 & AI-900, AWS Cloud Practitioner 2017, MS Professional Developer MCPD2012, ITIL v3
